properties.query:
SELECT
	data.[amb_temperature].value as amb_temperature,
    data.[bowl_temperature].value as bowl_temperature,
    data.[keg_temperature].value as keg_temperature,
    data.[keg_volume].value as keg_volume,
    data.[air_pressure].value as air_pressure,
    EventEnqueuedUtcTime as time,
    device_name
INTO BeerTemperature
FROM BeerIN
WHERE event_type='temperature'

SELECT 
    data.[locking1_detect_sw].value as locking1_detect_sw,
    data.[locking1_open_sw].value as locking1_open_sw,
    data.[air_pump].value as air_pump,
    data.[cooling_fan_run].value as cooling_fan_run,
    data.[locking2_detect_sw].value as locking2_detect_sw,
    data.[cooling_fan_ls].value as cooling_fan_ls,
    data.[temp_gauge_alert].value as temp_gauge_alert,
    data.[temp_gauge_backlight].value as temp_gauge_backlight,
    data.[keg_locking_led].value as keg_locking_led,
    data.[volume_gauge_backlight].value as volume_gauge_backlight,
    data.[cooling_fan_hs].value as cooling_fan_hs,
    data.[locking2_open_sw].value as locking2_open_sw,
    data.[air_pump_speed].value as air_pump_speed,
    data.[volume_gauge_alert].value as volume_gauge_alert,
    data.[defrost_coil].value as defrost_coil,
    data.[motor1].value as motor1,
    data.[motor2].value as motor2,
    data.[cooling_comp].value as cooling_comp,
    EventEnqueuedUtcTime as time,
    device_name
INTO BeerIOStat
FROM BeerIN
WHERE event_type='iostat'

SELECT 
	data.[cooling_compressor_stop].value as [cooling_compressor_stop],
	data.[cooling_fan_stop].value as [cooling_fan_stop],
	data.[c1_last_2l_timer].value as [c1_last_2l_timer],
	data.[c1_time_max].value as [c1_time_max],
	data.[c2_last_2l_timer].value as [c2_last_2l_timer],
	data.[c2_time_max].value as [c2_time_max],
	data.[c3_last_2l_timer].value as [c3_last_2l_timer],
	data.[c3_time_max].value as [c3_time_max],
	data.[calculated_total_volume].value as [calculated_total_volume],
	data.[cooling_compressor_high_limit].value as [cooling_compressor_high_limit],
	data.[cooling_compressor_low_limit].value as [cooling_compressor_low_limit],
	data.[cooling_fan_speed].value as [cooling_fan_speed],
	data.[current_keg_volume].value as [current_keg_volume],
	data.[cuton_sensor].value as [cuton_sensor],
	data.[debug_ambient].value as [debug_ambient],
	data.[debug_fan_speed_adjust].value as [debug_fan_speed_adjust],
	data.[display_debug_information_pdebug].value as [display_debug_information_pdebug],
	data.[fan_pwm].value as [fan_pwm],
	data.[pump_stop_work_time].value as [pump_stop_work_time],
	data.[fuzy_cc_off].value as [fuzy_cc_off],
	data.[fuzy_cc_on].value as [fuzy_cc_on],
	data.[keg_empty_waiting_time].value as [keg_empty_waiting_time],
	data.[keg_half_waiting_time].value as [keg_half_waiting_time],
	data.[keg_locking_buf].value as [keg_locking_buf],
	data.[keg_unlocking_buf].value as [keg_unlocking_buf],
	data.[last_2l_warmup].value as [last_2l_warmup],
	data.[light_brightnes_duty_value].value as [light_brightnes_duty_value],
	data.[locking1_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off as [locking1_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off],
	data.[locking2_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off].value as [locking2_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off],
	data.[main_frequency].value as [main_frequency],
	data.[max_ambient].value as [max_ambient],
	data.[max_air_value].value as [max_air_value],
	data.[max_air_pump_speed].value as [max_air_pump_speed],
	data.[max_rpm_pwm_fan].value as [max_rpm_pwm_fan],
	data.[measured_sensor_pressure].value as [measured_sensor_pressure],
	data.[min_ambient].value as [min_ambient],
	data.[min_air_value].value as [min_air_value],
	data.[min_rpm_pwmfan].value as [min_rpm_pwmfan],
	data.[minimum_cooling_running_time].value as [minimum_cooling_running_time],
	data.[minimum_cooling_stop_time].value as [minimum_cooling_stop_time],
	data.[minimum_fan_running_time].value as [minimum_fan_running_time],
	data.[printf_display_air].value as [printf_display_air],
	data.[printf_display_final_tester_data].value as [printf_display_final_tester_data],
	data.[printf_display_temp].value as [printf_display_temp],
	data.[pump_run_work_time].value as [pump_run_work_time],
	data.[snr].value as [snr],
	data.[smart_keg_start_temperature].value as [smart_keg_start_temperature],
	data.[state_locking].value as [state_locking],
	data.[tapping_cycle].value as [tapping_cycle],
	data.[temperature_defrost_volume].value as [temperature_defrost_volume],
	data.[temperature_regulation_time].value as [temperature_regulation_time],
	data.[tests_light_brightnes_duty_value].value as [tests_light_brightnes_duty_value],
	data.[third_pump_stop_work_time].value as [third_pump_stop_work_time],
	data.[total_count_compressor].value as [total_count_compressor],
	data.[total_count_defrost_coil].value as [total_count_defrost_coil],
	data.[total_count_locking1].value as [total_count_locking1],
	data.[total_count_locking2].value as [total_count_locking2],
	data.[total_time_defrost_coil].value as [total_time_defrost_coil],
	data.[total_time_air_pump].value as [total_time_air_pump],
	data.[total_time_keg_light].value as [total_time_keg_light],
	data.[unlocking1_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off].value as [unlocking1_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off],
	data.[unlocking2_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off].value as [unlocking2_refusals_by_current_limit_cut_off],
	EventEnqueuedUtcTime as time,
	device_name
INTO BeerRall
FROM BeerIN
WHERE event_type='rall'
